2.text: Take the number you want to square and drop the last digit (the five).
Multiply the remaining digits by their next counting number.

3.text: Find the midpoint of the 2 numbers.
Find the distance between one of the numbers and the midpoint.
Subtract the distance squared from the midpoint squared.
